name: Job hunt
description:
Welcome to the job hunt game

There are 4 different endings to the game, can you find them all?

This game is a sarcastic take on the search for a job in the modern world.

I am in no way, shape or form a game developer, and I have never been schooled in coding or the like, but it was an excellent excuse for me to learn something new.

 I hope you enjoyed it, but if nothing else, it was fun to make 😉

Enjoy - Kind regards, Lennart
